Name: Millions More
RewardDescription: Unlocks the Mitosis Mode mutator, which has enemies splitting into lower tier variants on death.
FunFact: The way BFA2 is designed, the strength of waves grows exponentially at an approximate increase of some 20%-30% more "difficulty credits" each wave. The player, however, is not so lucky, as they must constantly research new things in order to keep up with this.

$Data.Name: Mitosis Mode
$Data.Description: Slaying a higher tier enemy spawns lower tier variants.
